responses.s0_q1: Yes: A formal, dedicated unit or office is operational and has clear responsibilities.
responses.s0_q2: Partially: A policy exists but is not fully aligned or not widely communicated.
responses.s0_q3: Yes: All roles and responsibilities are documented and assigned.
responses.s0_q0: Yes: The strategy is documented, covers all 12 NDP domains, and is reviewed/updated annually.
responses.s1_q0: Yes: A comprehensive architecture exists, is documented, and regularly updated.
responses.s1_q1: Partially: An EDM exists but is incomplete or not fully utilized.
responses.s1_q2: Partially: Some models have been submitted or reviewed, but not all.
responses.s2_q0: Partially: A policy exists but is not fully aligned or not published.
responses.s2_q1: Yes: A formal program is in place, with regular assessments and improvements.
responses.s2_q2: Yes: Scorecards and KPIs are implemented and actively monitored.
responses.s3_q0: Partially: A policy exists but is incomplete or not aligned.
responses.s3_q1: Yes: A comprehensive MDM program and plan are operational.
responses.s3_q2: Partially: Some coordination/approval has occurred, but not comprehensively.
responses.s4_q0: Partially: Policy/program exists but is incomplete or covers only part of the lifecycle.
responses.s4_q1: Yes: There is a clear plan and active implementation to digitize processes.
responses.s5_q0: Yes: A comprehensive catalog and metadata system is in place and maintained.
responses.s5_q1: Yes: Metadata structure fully aligns with NPC standards.
responses.s6_q0: Yes: Policies are documented, compliant, and regularly reviewed.
responses.s6_q1: Partially: Some solutions are compliant, but not all.
responses.s7_q0: Yes: A formal, published policy exists.
responses.s7_q1: No: Data sharing is not secure or compliant.
responses.s8_q0: Partially: Some alignment exists, but not comprehensive.
responses.s8_q1: Partially: Some use cases exist, but not a full portfolio.
responses.s8_q2: Yes: All official statistics follow NQAF and international standards.
responses.s9_q0: Yes: Opportunities are identified and documented, with legal compliance.
responses.s9_q1: Partially: Some efforts or plans exist, but not comprehensive.
responses.s10_q0: Partially: Some compliance, but gaps remain.
responses.s10_q1: Yes: All assets are classified per policy.
responses.s10_q2: Partially: Some automation exists, but not comprehensive.
responses.s11_q0: Yes: A formal program is in place and active.
responses.s11_q1: Yes: Curriculums and learning paths are defined and aligned.
responses.s12_q0: Yes: Regular audits and reviews are conducted and documented.
responses.s12_q1: Yes: Mechanisms are documented, communicated, and enforced.
